subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Derek Fisher, 36, a critical part of the Lakers’ chances to three-peat, is in a pitched battle with Dallas’s Jason Kidd, 38, one of the game’s most gifted passers.
snippet: Derek Fisher, 36, a critical part of the Lakers’ chances to three-peat, is in a pitched battle with Dallas’s Jason Kidd, 38, one of the game’s most gifted passers.
